1447  objectArray[1]!=null? new Long(objectArray[1].toString()):-1L);
1448  }
1449 
1450 
1451  for(Resource resource :resources){
1452 
1453  if(resource.getCode()==null||resource.getCode().trim().equals("")){
1454  throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код ресурса!");
1455  }else if(resource.getName()==null||resource.getName().trim().equals("")){
1456  throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует название ресурса!");
1457  }
1458 
1459 
1460  linksLine=null;
1461 
1462  if(resource.getLinks()!=null&&!resource.getLinks().isEmpty()){
1463 
1464  for(String link :resource.getLinks()){
1465  if(linksLine==null){
1466  linksLine=link;
1467  }else{
1468  linksLine=linksLine+","+link;
1469  }
1470  }
1471  }
1472 
1473  if(res_cl.containsKey(resource.getCode())){
1474 
1475  em.createNativeQuery(
1476  "UPDATE AC_IS_BSS_T sys "+
1477  "set sys.FULL_=?, sys.DESCRIPTION=?, sys.LINKS=? "+
1478  "where sys.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ")
1479  .setParameter(1, resource.getName())
1480  .setParameter(2, resource.getDescription())
1481  .setParameter(3, linksLine)
1482  .setParameter(4, resource.getCode())
1483 
1484  .executeUpdate();
1485 
1486 
1487  }else{
1488 
1489  List results = em.createNativeQuery("select AC_IS_BSS_SEQ.nextval from dual ").getResultList();
1490 
1491  Long newIdRes = ((BigDecimal)results.get(0)).longValue();
1492 
1493  em.createNativeQuery(
1494  "insert into AC_IS_BSS_T(ID_SRV, SIGN_OBJECT, FULL_ , DESCRIPTION, LINKS, CREATOR, created ) "+
1495  "values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 1, sysdate) ")
1496  .setParameter(1, newIdRes)
1497  .setParameter(2, resource.getCode())
1498  .setParameter(3, resource.getName())
1499  .setParameter(4, resource.getDescription())
1500  .setParameter(5, linksLine)
1501  .executeUpdate();
1502 
1503 
1504  em.createNativeQuery(
1505  "insert into LINK_GROUP_SYS_SYS_KNL_T(UP_SYSTEMS, UP_GROUP_SYSTEMS, CREATOR, CREATED ) "+
1506  "values(?, (select gr_sys.ID_SRV from GROUP_SYSTEMS_KNL_T gr_sys where gr_sys.GROUP_CODE = ? ), 1, sysdate) ")
1507  .setParameter(1, newIdRes)
1508  .setParameter(2, idIS)
1509  .executeUpdate();
1510 
1511  }
1512  }
1513  }
1514  }
1515 
1516  sys_audit(101L, "idIS:"+idIS, "true", IPAddress, null );
1517 
1518  utx.commit();
1519 
1520  }catch(Exception eSres){
1521 
1522  try{
1523  utx.rollback();
1524 
1525  utx.begin();
1526  sys_audit(101L, "idIS:"+idIS, "error", IPAddress, null );
1527  utx.commit();
1528 
1529  }catch (Exception erSres) {
1530  try{
1531  utx.rollback();
1532  }catch (Exception errSres)
1533  {
1534  LOGGER.error("rollback:Error1:"+errSres);
1535  }
1536  LOGGER.error("rollback:Error:"+erSres);
1537  }
1538 
1539  throw new GeneralFailure(eSres.getMessage());
1540  }
1541  }
1542 
1543 
1544 
1548  public void sync_resources_roles(String idIS, List<String> codesResources,
1549  List<String> codesRoles, String modeExec, Long idUserAuth,
1550  String IPAddress) throws GeneralFailure {
1551 
1552  // для систем и подсистем␀ // !!! // привязка ролей происходит попринципу ADD // modeExec: // 0 - REPLACE // 1 - ADD // 2 - REMOVE // при REMOVE, если у роли есть пользователи или группы, // то выдаём исключение // ADD - это ADD или UPDATE LOGGER.debug("sync_groups_roles:01"); List<String> role_cl = new ArrayList<String>(); try { utx.begin(); /* * проверка на уровне выше - is_exist() */ if (idIS == null) { throw new GeneralFailure("idIS is null!"); } if (codesResources == null || codesResources.isEmpty()) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует список ресурсов!"); } if (codesRoles == null || codesRoles.isEmpty()) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует список ролей!"); } if (modeExec == null || modeExec.trim().isEmpty() || (!"REPLACE".equals(modeExec) && !"ADD".equals(modeExec) && !"REMOVE".equals(modeExec))) { throw new GeneralFailure("Некорректные данные [modeExec]!"); } int modeSyncResRoles = 1; if ("REPLACE".equals(modeExec)) { modeSyncResRoles = 0; } else if ("ADD".equals(modeExec)) { modeSyncResRoles = 1; } else if ("REMOVE".equals(modeExec)) { modeSyncResRoles = 2; } // !!! idIS = get_code_is(idIS); if (modeSyncResRoles == 1) { // //ADD for (String resource : codesResources) { if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код ресурса!"); } role_cl = new ArrayList<String>(); // привязка ролей к ресурсу LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:03"); // имеющиеся роли в ресурсе по данной системе List<Object[]> lo_roles = em .createNativeQuery( " SELECT ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV " + "FROM AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, " + "AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lgr, " + "AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol, " + "AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "WHERE res.ID_SRV = LGR.UP_RESOURCE " + "AND LGR.UP_ROLE = ROL.ID_SRV " + "AND SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "AND SYS.ID_SRV = ROL.UP_IS " + "AND res.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "GROUP BY ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV") .setParameter(1, idIS).setParameter(2, resource) .getResultList(); for (Object[] objectArray : lo_roles) { role_cl.add(objectArray[0] != null ? objectArray[0] .toString() : ""); LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + objectArray[0]); } for (String role_code : codesRoles) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05:" + role_code); if (!role_cl.contains(role_code)) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:06"); em.createNativeQuery( "insert into AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T(UP_ROLE, UP_RESOURCE, CREATOR, created) " + "values (" + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), " + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol " + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ") .setParameter(1, idIS) .setParameter(2, role_code) .setParameter(3, resource) .setParameter(4, 1L).executeUpdate(); } } } } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 2) { // REMOVE LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:03"); for (String resource : codesResources) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + resource); if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!"); } try { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05"); for (String role_code : codesRoles) { em.createNativeQuery( "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr " + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = " + "(select RES.ID_SRV " + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res " + "AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV " + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode " + "and RES.SIGN_OBJECT = :resCode ) " + "and lrr.UP_ROLE = " + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = :roleCode ) ") .setParameter("sysCode", idIS) .setParameter("roleCode", role_code) .setParameter("resCode", resource) .executeUpdate(); } } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("sync_resources_roles:06"); } } } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 0) { // REPLACE // REPLACE = ALL REMOVE + ADD LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:07"); for (String resource : codesResources) { if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!"); } // 1. REMOVE ALL try { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:09"); em.createNativeQuery( "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr " + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = ( " + "select RES.ID_SRV " + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, " + "AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV " + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and RES.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ) ") .setParameter(1, resource) .setParameter(2, idIS).executeUpdate(); } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("sync_resources_roles:010"); } // 2.ADD for (String role_code : codesRoles) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05:" + role_code); if (role_code == null || role_code.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код роли!"); } em.createNativeQuery( "insert into AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T(UP_ROLE, UP_RESOURCE, CREATOR, created) " + "values (" + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), " + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol " + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ") .setParameter(1, idIS) .setParameter(2, role_code) .setParameter(3, resource).setParameter(4, 1L) .executeUpdate(); } } } sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "true", IPAddress, null); utx.commit(); } catch (Exception eSresr) { try { utx.rollback(); utx.begin(); sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "error", IPAddress, null); utx.commit(); } catch (Exception erSresr) { try { utx.rollback(); } catch (Exception errSresr) { LOGGER.error("rollback:Error1:", errSresr); } LOGGER.error("rollback:Error:", erSresr); } throw new GeneralFailure(eSresr.getMessage()); } } /** * проверка наличия системы */ public void is_exist(String idIS) throws GeneralFailure { LOGGER.debug(":is_exist:01"); try { em.createNativeQuery( "select APP.ID_SRV " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where APP.SIGN_OBJECT=?").setParameter(1, idIS) .getSingleResult(); } catch (NoResultException ex) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:NoResultException"); throw new GeneralFailure("Информационная система не определёна!"); } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e); throw new GeneralFailure(e.getMessage()); } } /** * получение кода системы по коду подсистемы */ private String get_code_is(String codeSys) throws GeneralFailure { // позволяет съесть ситуацию, когда имеем код подсистемы, // на выходе получаем код системы String resultSync = null; try { resultSync = (String) em .createNativeQuery( "select SYS.SIGN_OBJECT " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T sys, " + "AC_SUBSYSTEM_CERT_BSS_T subsys " + "where (SYS.SIGN_OBJECT= :codeSys or SUBSYS.SUBSYSTEM_CODE= :codeSys) " + "and SUBSYS.UP_IS(+) =SYS.ID_SRV " + "group by SYS.SIGN_OBJECT ") .setParameter("codeSys", codeSys).getSingleResult(); } catch (NoResultException exSync) { LOGGER.error("get_id_is:NoResultException"); throw new GeneralFailure("System is not defined"); } catch (Exception eSync) { throw new GeneralFailure(eSync.getMessage()); } return resultSync; } /** * протоколирование действий */ private void sys_audit(Long idServ, String inp_param, String result, String ip_adr, Long idUser) { LOGGER.debug("sys_audit:01"); try { if (idUser != null && !idUser.equals(-1L)) { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address, UP_USERS ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).setParameter(5, idUser) .executeUpdate(); } else { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).executeUpdate(); } } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e); } } }
1553 
1554  // !!!
1555  // привязка ролей происходит попринципу ADD
1556 
1557  // modeExec:
1558  // 0 - REPLACE
1559  // 1 - ADD
1560  // 2 - REMOVE
1561 
1562  // при REMOVE, если у роли есть пользователи или группы,
1563  // то выдаём исключение␀ // ADD - это ADD или UPDATE LOGGER.debug("sync_groups_roles:01"); List<String> role_cl = new ArrayList<String>(); try { utx.begin(); /* * проверка на уровне выше - is_exist() */ if (idIS == null) { throw new GeneralFailure("idIS is null!"); } if (codesResources == null || codesResources.isEmpty()) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует список ресурсов!"); } if (codesRoles == null || codesRoles.isEmpty()) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует список ролей!"); } if (modeExec == null || modeExec.trim().isEmpty() || (!"REPLACE".equals(modeExec) && !"ADD".equals(modeExec) && !"REMOVE".equals(modeExec))) { throw new GeneralFailure("Некорректные данные [modeExec]!"); } int modeSyncResRoles = 1; if ("REPLACE".equals(modeExec)) { modeSyncResRoles = 0; } else if ("ADD".equals(modeExec)) { modeSyncResRoles = 1; } else if ("REMOVE".equals(modeExec)) { modeSyncResRoles = 2; } // !!! idIS = get_code_is(idIS); if (modeSyncResRoles == 1) { // //ADD for (String resource : codesResources) { if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код ресурса!"); } role_cl = new ArrayList<String>(); // привязка ролей к ресурсу LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:03"); // имеющиеся роли в ресурсе по данной системе List<Object[]> lo_roles = em .createNativeQuery( " SELECT ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV " + "FROM AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, " + "AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lgr, " + "AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol, " + "AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "WHERE res.ID_SRV = LGR.UP_RESOURCE " + "AND LGR.UP_ROLE = ROL.ID_SRV " + "AND SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "AND SYS.ID_SRV = ROL.UP_IS " + "AND res.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "GROUP BY ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV") .setParameter(1, idIS).setParameter(2, resource) .getResultList(); for (Object[] objectArray : lo_roles) { role_cl.add(objectArray[0] != null ? objectArray[0] .toString() : ""); LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + objectArray[0]); } for (String role_code : codesRoles) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05:" + role_code); if (!role_cl.contains(role_code)) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:06"); em.createNativeQuery( "insert into AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T(UP_ROLE, UP_RESOURCE, CREATOR, created) " + "values (" + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), " + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol " + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ") .setParameter(1, idIS) .setParameter(2, role_code) .setParameter(3, resource) .setParameter(4, 1L).executeUpdate(); } } } } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 2) { // REMOVE LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:03"); for (String resource : codesResources) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + resource); if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!"); } try { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05"); for (String role_code : codesRoles) { em.createNativeQuery( "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr " + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = " + "(select RES.ID_SRV " + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res " + "AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV " + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode " + "and RES.SIGN_OBJECT = :resCode ) " + "and lrr.UP_ROLE = " + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = :roleCode ) ") .setParameter("sysCode", idIS) .setParameter("roleCode", role_code) .setParameter("resCode", resource) .executeUpdate(); } } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("sync_resources_roles:06"); } } } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 0) { // REPLACE // REPLACE = ALL REMOVE + ADD LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:07"); for (String resource : codesResources) { if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!"); } // 1. REMOVE ALL try { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:09"); em.createNativeQuery( "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr " + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = ( " + "select RES.ID_SRV " + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, " + "AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV " + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and RES.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ) ") .setParameter(1, resource) .setParameter(2, idIS).executeUpdate(); } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("sync_resources_roles:010"); } // 2.ADD for (String role_code : codesRoles) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05:" + role_code); if (role_code == null || role_code.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код роли!"); } em.createNativeQuery( "insert into AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T(UP_ROLE, UP_RESOURCE, CREATOR, created) " + "values (" + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), " + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol " + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ") .setParameter(1, idIS) .setParameter(2, role_code) .setParameter(3, resource).setParameter(4, 1L) .executeUpdate(); } } } sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "true", IPAddress, null); utx.commit(); } catch (Exception eSresr) { try { utx.rollback(); utx.begin(); sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "error", IPAddress, null); utx.commit(); } catch (Exception erSresr) { try { utx.rollback(); } catch (Exception errSresr) { LOGGER.error("rollback:Error1:", errSresr); } LOGGER.error("rollback:Error:", erSresr); } throw new GeneralFailure(eSresr.getMessage()); } } /** * проверка наличия системы */ public void is_exist(String idIS) throws GeneralFailure { LOGGER.debug(":is_exist:01"); try { em.createNativeQuery( "select APP.ID_SRV " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where APP.SIGN_OBJECT=?").setParameter(1, idIS) .getSingleResult(); } catch (NoResultException ex) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:NoResultException"); throw new GeneralFailure("Информационная система не определёна!"); } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e); throw new GeneralFailure(e.getMessage()); } } /** * получение кода системы по коду подсистемы */ private String get_code_is(String codeSys) throws GeneralFailure { // позволяет съесть ситуацию, когда имеем код подсистемы, // на выходе получаем код системы String resultSync = null; try { resultSync = (String) em .createNativeQuery( "select SYS.SIGN_OBJECT " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T sys, " + "AC_SUBSYSTEM_CERT_BSS_T subsys " + "where (SYS.SIGN_OBJECT= :codeSys or SUBSYS.SUBSYSTEM_CODE= :codeSys) " + "and SUBSYS.UP_IS(+) =SYS.ID_SRV " + "group by SYS.SIGN_OBJECT ") .setParameter("codeSys", codeSys).getSingleResult(); } catch (NoResultException exSync) { LOGGER.error("get_id_is:NoResultException"); throw new GeneralFailure("System is not defined"); } catch (Exception eSync) { throw new GeneralFailure(eSync.getMessage()); } return resultSync; } /** * протоколирование действий */ private void sys_audit(Long idServ, String inp_param, String result, String ip_adr, Long idUser) { LOGGER.debug("sys_audit:01"); try { if (idUser != null && !idUser.equals(-1L)) { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address, UP_USERS ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).setParameter(5, idUser) .executeUpdate(); } else { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).executeUpdate(); } } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e); } } }
1564 
1565  // ADD - это ADD или UPDATE
1566 
1567  LOGGER.debug("sync_groups_roles:01");
1568 
1569  List<String> role_cl = new ArrayList<String>();
1570 
1571  try {
1572 
1573  utx.begin();
1574 
1575  /*
1576  * проверка на уровне выше - is_exist()
1577  */
1578 
1579  if (idIS == null) {
1580  throw new GeneralFailure("idIS is null!");
1581  }
1582 
1583  if (codesResources == null
1584  || codesResources.isEmpty()) {
1585  throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует список ресурсов!");
1586  }
1587  if (codesRoles == null
1588  || codesRoles.isEmpty()) {
1589  throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует список ролей!");
1590  }
1591 
1592 
1593 
1594  if (modeExec == null
1595  || modeExec.trim().isEmpty()
1596  || (!"REPLACE".equals(modeExec) && !"ADD".equals(modeExec) &&
1597  !"REMOVE".equals(modeExec))) {
1598  throw new GeneralFailure("Некорректные данные [modeExec]!");
1599  }
1600 
1601  int modeSyncResRoles = 1;
1602 
1603  if ("REPLACE".equals(modeExec)) {
1604  modeSyncResRoles = 0;
1605  } else if ("ADD".equals(modeExec)) {
1606  modeSyncResRoles = 1;
1607  } else if ("REMOVE".equals(modeExec)) {
1608  modeSyncResRoles = 2;
1609  }
1610 
1611  // !!!
1612  idIS = get_code_is(idIS);
1613 
1614  if (modeSyncResRoles == 1) { // //ADD
1615 
1616  for (String resource : codesResources) {
1617 
1618  if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) {
1619  throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код ресурса!");
1620  }
1621 
1622  role_cl = new ArrayList<String>();
1623 
1624  // привязка ролей к ресурсу␀ LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:03"); // имеющиеся роли в ресурсе по данной системе List<Object[]> lo_roles = em .createNativeQuery( " SELECT ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV " + "FROM AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, " + "AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lgr, " + "AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol, " + "AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "WHERE res.ID_SRV = LGR.UP_RESOURCE " + "AND LGR.UP_ROLE = ROL.ID_SRV " + "AND SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "AND SYS.ID_SRV = ROL.UP_IS " + "AND res.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "GROUP BY ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV") .setParameter(1, idIS).setParameter(2, resource) .getResultList(); for (Object[] objectArray : lo_roles) { role_cl.add(objectArray[0] != null ? objectArray[0] .toString() : ""); LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + objectArray[0]); } for (String role_code : codesRoles) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05:" + role_code); if (!role_cl.contains(role_code)) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:06"); em.createNativeQuery( "insert into AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T(UP_ROLE, UP_RESOURCE, CREATOR, created) " + "values (" + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), " + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol " + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ") .setParameter(1, idIS) .setParameter(2, role_code) .setParameter(3, resource) .setParameter(4, 1L).executeUpdate(); } } } } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 2) { // REMOVE LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:03"); for (String resource : codesResources) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + resource); if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!"); } try { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05"); for (String role_code : codesRoles) { em.createNativeQuery( "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr " + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = " + "(select RES.ID_SRV " + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res " + "AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV " + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode " + "and RES.SIGN_OBJECT = :resCode ) " + "and lrr.UP_ROLE = " + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = :roleCode ) ") .setParameter("sysCode", idIS) .setParameter("roleCode", role_code) .setParameter("resCode", resource) .executeUpdate(); } } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("sync_resources_roles:06"); } } } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 0) { // REPLACE // REPLACE = ALL REMOVE + ADD LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:07"); for (String resource : codesResources) { if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!"); } // 1. REMOVE ALL try { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:09"); em.createNativeQuery( "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr " + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = ( " + "select RES.ID_SRV " + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, " + "AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV " + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and RES.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ) ") .setParameter(1, resource) .setParameter(2, idIS).executeUpdate(); } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("sync_resources_roles:010"); } // 2.ADD for (String role_code : codesRoles) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05:" + role_code); if (role_code == null || role_code.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код роли!"); } em.createNativeQuery( "insert into AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T(UP_ROLE, UP_RESOURCE, CREATOR, created) " + "values (" + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), " + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol " + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ") .setParameter(1, idIS) .setParameter(2, role_code) .setParameter(3, resource).setParameter(4, 1L) .executeUpdate(); } } } sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "true", IPAddress, null); utx.commit(); } catch (Exception eSresr) { try { utx.rollback(); utx.begin(); sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "error", IPAddress, null); utx.commit(); } catch (Exception erSresr) { try { utx.rollback(); } catch (Exception errSresr) { LOGGER.error("rollback:Error1:", errSresr); } LOGGER.error("rollback:Error:", erSresr); } throw new GeneralFailure(eSresr.getMessage()); } } /** * проверка наличия системы */ public void is_exist(String idIS) throws GeneralFailure { LOGGER.debug(":is_exist:01"); try { em.createNativeQuery( "select APP.ID_SRV " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where APP.SIGN_OBJECT=?").setParameter(1, idIS) .getSingleResult(); } catch (NoResultException ex) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:NoResultException"); throw new GeneralFailure("Информационная система не определёна!"); } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e); throw new GeneralFailure(e.getMessage()); } } /** * получение кода системы по коду подсистемы */ private String get_code_is(String codeSys) throws GeneralFailure { // позволяет съесть ситуацию, когда имеем код подсистемы, // на выходе получаем код системы String resultSync = null; try { resultSync = (String) em .createNativeQuery( "select SYS.SIGN_OBJECT " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T sys, " + "AC_SUBSYSTEM_CERT_BSS_T subsys " + "where (SYS.SIGN_OBJECT= :codeSys or SUBSYS.SUBSYSTEM_CODE= :codeSys) " + "and SUBSYS.UP_IS(+) =SYS.ID_SRV " + "group by SYS.SIGN_OBJECT ") .setParameter("codeSys", codeSys).getSingleResult(); } catch (NoResultException exSync) { LOGGER.error("get_id_is:NoResultException"); throw new GeneralFailure("System is not defined"); } catch (Exception eSync) { throw new GeneralFailure(eSync.getMessage()); } return resultSync; } /** * протоколирование действий */ private void sys_audit(Long idServ, String inp_param, String result, String ip_adr, Long idUser) { LOGGER.debug("sys_audit:01"); try { if (idUser != null && !idUser.equals(-1L)) { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address, UP_USERS ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).setParameter(5, idUser) .executeUpdate(); } else { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).executeUpdate(); } } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e); } } }
1625  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:03");
1626 
1627  // имеющиеся роли в ресурсе по данной системе␀ List<Object[]> lo_roles = em .createNativeQuery( " SELECT ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV " + "FROM AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, " + "AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lgr, " + "AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol, " + "AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "WHERE res.ID_SRV = LGR.UP_RESOURCE " + "AND LGR.UP_ROLE = ROL.ID_SRV " + "AND SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "AND SYS.ID_SRV = ROL.UP_IS " + "AND res.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "GROUP BY ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV") .setParameter(1, idIS).setParameter(2, resource) .getResultList(); for (Object[] objectArray : lo_roles) { role_cl.add(objectArray[0] != null ? objectArray[0] .toString() : ""); LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + objectArray[0]); } for (String role_code : codesRoles) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05:" + role_code); if (!role_cl.contains(role_code)) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:06"); em.createNativeQuery( "insert into AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T(UP_ROLE, UP_RESOURCE, CREATOR, created) " + "values (" + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), " + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol " + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ") .setParameter(1, idIS) .setParameter(2, role_code) .setParameter(3, resource) .setParameter(4, 1L).executeUpdate(); } } } } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 2) { // REMOVE LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:03"); for (String resource : codesResources) { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + resource); if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!"); } try { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05"); for (String role_code : codesRoles) { em.createNativeQuery( "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr " + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = " + "(select RES.ID_SRV " + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res " + "AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV " + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode " + "and RES.SIGN_OBJECT = :resCode ) " + "and lrr.UP_ROLE = " + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys " + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = :roleCode ) ") .setParameter("sysCode", idIS) .setParameter("roleCode", role_code) .setParameter("resCode", resource) .executeUpdate(); } } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("sync_resources_roles:06"); } } } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 0) { // REPLACE // REPLACE = ALL REMOVE + ADD LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:07"); for (String resource : codesResources) { if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) { throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!"); } // 1. REMOVE ALL try { LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:09"); em.createNativeQuery( "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr " + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = ( " + "select RES.ID_SRV " + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, " + "AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV " + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = ? " + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), " + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol " + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ") .setParameter(1, idIS) .setParameter(2, role_code) .setParameter(3, resource).setParameter(4, 1L) .executeUpdate(); } } } sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "true", IPAddress, null); utx.commit(); } catch (Exception eSresr) { try { utx.rollback(); utx.begin(); sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "error", IPAddress, null); utx.commit(); } catch (Exception erSresr) { try { utx.rollback(); } catch (Exception errSresr) { LOGGER.error("rollback:Error1:", errSresr); } LOGGER.error("rollback:Error:", erSresr); } throw new GeneralFailure(eSresr.getMessage()); } } /** * проверка наличия системы */ public void is_exist(String idIS) throws GeneralFailure { LOGGER.debug(":is_exist:01"); try { em.createNativeQuery( "select APP.ID_SRV " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T app " + "where APP.SIGN_OBJECT=?").setParameter(1, idIS) .getSingleResult(); } catch (NoResultException ex) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:NoResultException"); throw new GeneralFailure("Информационная система не определёна!"); } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e); throw new GeneralFailure(e.getMessage()); } } /** * получение кода системы по коду подсистемы */ private String get_code_is(String codeSys) throws GeneralFailure { // позволяет съесть ситуацию, когда имеем код подсистемы, // на выходе получаем код системы String resultSync = null; try { resultSync = (String) em .createNativeQuery( "select SYS.SIGN_OBJECT " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T sys, " + "AC_SUBSYSTEM_CERT_BSS_T subsys " + "where (SYS.SIGN_OBJECT= :codeSys or SUBSYS.SUBSYSTEM_CODE= :codeSys) " + "and SUBSYS.UP_IS(+) =SYS.ID_SRV " + "group by SYS.SIGN_OBJECT ") .setParameter("codeSys", codeSys).getSingleResult(); } catch (NoResultException exSync) { LOGGER.error("get_id_is:NoResultException"); throw new GeneralFailure("System is not defined"); } catch (Exception eSync) { throw new GeneralFailure(eSync.getMessage()); } return resultSync; } /** * протоколирование действий */ private void sys_audit(Long idServ, String inp_param, String result, String ip_adr, Long idUser) { LOGGER.debug("sys_audit:01"); try { if (idUser != null && !idUser.equals(-1L)) { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address, UP_USERS ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).setParameter(5, idUser) .executeUpdate(); } else { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).executeUpdate(); } } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e); } } }
1628 
1629  List<Object[]> lo_roles = em
1630  .createNativeQuery(
1631  " SELECT ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV "
1632  + "FROM AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, "
1633  + "AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lgr, "
1634  + "AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol, "
1635  + "AC_IS_BSS_T sys "
1636  + "WHERE res.ID_SRV = LGR.UP_RESOURCE "
1637  + "AND LGR.UP_ROLE = ROL.ID_SRV "
1638  + "AND SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? "
1639  + "AND SYS.ID_SRV = ROL.UP_IS "
1640  + "AND res.SIGN_OBJECT = ? "
1641  + "GROUP BY ROL.SIGN_OBJECT, ROL.ID_SRV")
1642  .setParameter(1, idIS).setParameter(2, resource)
1643  .getResultList();
1644 
1645  for (Object[] objectArray : lo_roles) {
1646  role_cl.add(objectArray[0] != null ? objectArray[0]
1647  .toString() : "");
1648 
1649  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + objectArray[0]);
1650 
1651  }
1652 
1653  for (String role_code : codesRoles) {
1654 
1655  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05:" + role_code);
1656 
1657  if (!role_cl.contains(role_code)) {
1658 
1659  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:06");
1660 
1661  em.createNativeQuery(
1662  "insert into AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T(UP_ROLE, UP_RESOURCE, CREATOR, created) "
1663  + "values ("
1664  + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys "
1665  + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? "
1666  + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), "
1667  + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol "
1668  + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ")
1669  .setParameter(1, idIS)
1670  .setParameter(2, role_code)
1671  .setParameter(3, resource)
1672  .setParameter(4, 1L).executeUpdate();
1673  }
1674  }
1675  }
1676 
1677  } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 2) { // REMOVE
1678 
1679  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:03");
1680 
1681  for (String resource : codesResources) {
1682 
1683  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:04:" + resource);
1684 
1685  if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) {
1686  throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!");
1687  }
1688 
1689  try {
1690  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05");
1691 
1692  for (String role_code : codesRoles) {
1693 
1694  em.createNativeQuery(
1695 
1696  "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr "
1697  + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = "
1698  + "(select RES.ID_SRV "
1699  + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res "
1700  + "AC_IS_BSS_T app "
1701  + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV "
1702  + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode "
1703  + "and RES.SIGN_OBJECT = :resCode ) "
1704  + "and lrr.UP_ROLE = "
1705  + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys "
1706  + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = :sysCode "
1707  + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = :roleCode ) ")
1708  .setParameter("sysCode", idIS)
1709  .setParameter("roleCode", role_code)
1710  .setParameter("resCode", resource)
1711  .executeUpdate();
1712 
1713  }
1714 
1715  } catch (Exception e) {
1716  LOGGER.error("sync_resources_roles:06");
1717  }
1718 
1719  }
1720 
1721  } else if (modeSyncResRoles == 0) { // REPLACE
1722 
1723  // REPLACE = ALL REMOVE + ADD
1724  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:07");
1725 
1726  for (String resource : codesResources) {
1727 
1728  if (resource == null || resource.trim().equals("")) {
1729  throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код группы!");
1730  }
1731 
1732  // 1. REMOVE ALL
1733 
1734  try {
1735  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:09");
1736 
1737  em.createNativeQuery(
1738  "DELETE FROM AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T lrr "
1739  + "where LRR.UP_RESOURCE = ( "
1740  + "select RES.ID_SRV "
1741  + "from AC_RESOURCES_BSS_T res, "
1742  + "AC_IS_BSS_T app "
1743  + "where res.UP_IS=APP.ID_SRV "
1744  + "and APP.SIGN_OBJECT = ? "
1745  + "and RES.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ) ")
1746  .setParameter(1, resource)
1747  .setParameter(2, idIS).executeUpdate();
1748 
1749  } catch (Exception e) {
1750  LOGGER.error("sync_resources_roles:010");
1751  }
1752 
1753  // 2.ADD
1754 
1755  for (String role_code : codesRoles) {
1756 
1757  LOGGER.debug("sync_resources_roles:05:" + role_code);
1758 
1759  if (role_code == null || role_code.trim().equals("")) {
1760  throw new GeneralFailure("Отсутствует код роли!");
1761  }
1762 
1763  em.createNativeQuery(
1764  "insert into AC_LINK_ROLE_RESOURCE_KNL_T(UP_ROLE, UP_RESOURCE, CREATOR, created) "
1765  + "values ("
1766  + "(select role.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T role, AC_IS_BSS_T sys "
1767  + "where SYS.ID_SRV= ROLE.UP_IS and SYS.SIGN_OBJECT = ? "
1768  + "and role.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), "
1769  + "(select ROL.ID_SRV from AC_ROLES_BSS_T rol "
1770  + "where rol.SIGN_OBJECT = ? ), ?, sysdate) ")
1771  .setParameter(1, idIS)
1772  .setParameter(2, role_code)
1773  .setParameter(3, resource).setParameter(4, 1L)
1774  .executeUpdate();
1775 
1776  }
1777  }
1778 
1779  }
1780 
1781  sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "true", IPAddress, null);
1782 
1783  utx.commit();
1784 
1785  } catch (Exception eSresr) {
1786 
1787  try {
1788 
1789  utx.rollback();
1790 
1791  utx.begin();
1792  sys_audit(12L, "idIS:" + idIS, "error", IPAddress, null);
1793  utx.commit();
1794 
1795  } catch (Exception erSresr) {
1796  try {
1797  utx.rollback();
1798  } catch (Exception errSresr) {
1799  LOGGER.error("rollback:Error1:", errSresr);
1800  }
1801  LOGGER.error("rollback:Error:", erSresr);
1802  }
1803  throw new GeneralFailure(eSresr.getMessage());
1804  }
1805  }

1810  public void is_exist(String idIS) throws GeneralFailure {
1811 
1812  LOGGER.debug(":is_exist:01");
1813 
1814  try {
1815 
1816  em.createNativeQuery(
1817  "select APP.ID_SRV " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T app "
1818  + "where APP.SIGN_OBJECT=?").setParameter(1, idIS)
1819  .getSingleResult();
1820 
1821  } catch (NoResultException ex) {
1822  LOGGER.error("is_exist:NoResultException");
1823  throw new GeneralFailure("Информационная система не определёна!");
1824  } catch (Exception e) {
1825  LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e);
1826  throw new GeneralFailure(e.getMessage());
1827  }
1828  }

1833  private String get_code_is(String codeSys) throws GeneralFailure {
1834 
1835  // позволяет съесть ситуацию, когда имеем код подсистемы,
1836  // на выходе получаем код системы␀ String resultSync = null; try { resultSync = (String) em .createNativeQuery( "select SYS.SIGN_OBJECT " + "from AC_IS_BSS_T sys, " + "AC_SUBSYSTEM_CERT_BSS_T subsys " + "where (SYS.SIGN_OBJECT= :codeSys or SUBSYS.SUBSYSTEM_CODE= :codeSys) " + "and SUBSYS.UP_IS(+) =SYS.ID_SRV " + "group by SYS.SIGN_OBJECT ") .setParameter("codeSys", codeSys).getSingleResult(); } catch (NoResultException exSync) { LOGGER.error("get_id_is:NoResultException"); throw new GeneralFailure("System is not defined"); } catch (Exception eSync) { throw new GeneralFailure(eSync.getMessage()); } return resultSync; } /** * протоколирование действий */ private void sys_audit(Long idServ, String inp_param, String result, String ip_adr, Long idUser) { LOGGER.debug("sys_audit:01"); try { if (idUser != null && !idUser.equals(-1L)) { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address, UP_USERS ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).setParameter(5, idUser) .executeUpdate(); } else { em.createNativeQuery( "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( " + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, " + "input_param, result_value, ip_address ) " + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, " + "?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ) .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result) .setParameter(4, ip_adr).executeUpdate(); } } catch (Exception e) { LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e); } } }
1837 
1838  String resultSync = null;
1839 
1840  try {
1841  resultSync = (String) em
1842  .createNativeQuery(
1843  "select SYS.SIGN_OBJECT "
1844  + "from AC_IS_BSS_T sys, "
1845  + "AC_SUBSYSTEM_CERT_BSS_T subsys "
1846  + "where (SYS.SIGN_OBJECT= :codeSys or SUBSYS.SUBSYSTEM_CODE= :codeSys) "
1847  + "and SUBSYS.UP_IS(+) =SYS.ID_SRV "
1848  + "group by SYS.SIGN_OBJECT ")
1849  .setParameter("codeSys", codeSys).getSingleResult();
1850 
1851  } catch (NoResultException exSync) {
1852  LOGGER.error("get_id_is:NoResultException");
1853  throw new GeneralFailure("System is not defined");
1854  } catch (Exception eSync) {
1855  throw new GeneralFailure(eSync.getMessage());
1856  }
1857  return resultSync;
1858 
1859  }

1864  private void sys_audit(Long idServ, String inp_param, String result,
1865  String ip_adr, Long idUser) {
1866  LOGGER.debug("sys_audit:01");
1867  try {
1868 
1869  if (idUser != null && !idUser.equals(-1L)) {
1870  em.createNativeQuery(
1871  "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( "
1872  + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, "
1873  + "input_param, result_value, ip_address, UP_USERS ) "
1874  + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, "
1875  + "?, ?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ)
1876  .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result)
1877  .setParameter(4, ip_adr).setParameter(5, idUser)
1878  .executeUpdate();
1879  } else {
1880  em.createNativeQuery(
1881  "insert into SERVICES_LOG_KNL_T( "
1882  + "ID_SRV, UP_SERVICES, DATE_ACTION, CREATED, "
1883  + "input_param, result_value, ip_address ) "
1884  + "values(SERVICES_LOG_KNL_SEQ.nextval , ?, sysdate, sysdate, "
1885  + "?, ?, ? ) ").setParameter(1, idServ)
1886  .setParameter(2, inp_param).setParameter(3, result)
1887  .setParameter(4, ip_adr).executeUpdate();
1888  }
1889  } catch (Exception e) {
1890  LOGGER.error("is_exist:Error:", e);
1891  }
1892 
1893  }
